posts.title: Anyone who wants to join my group?
posts.author: Ali bin Abu
posts.content: I am making a group for the subject computer architecture project but we are missing 2 people to help fill the group. Do any of you are interested?

comments.author: Sarah Johnson
comments.content: I'm interested! What are the project requirements?

comments.author: John Doe
comments.content: Count me in! When do we start working on it?

posts.title: How to prepare for the Data Structures exam?
posts.author: Sarah Johnson
posts.content: Hi everyone! I'm preparing for the upcoming Data Structures exam. Does anyone have study tips or resources to recommend? Any insights would be greatly appreciated!

comments.author: Muhammad Hassan
comments.content: I recommend going through all the past exam papers. They really help!

posts.title: Best practices for Web Development projects
posts.author: Muhammad Hassan
posts.content: I've been working on improving my web development skills. What are some best practices you follow when building projects? Would love to hear from the community!

comments.author: Emily Chen
comments.content: Always use semantic HTML and keep your CSS organized in separate files.

posts.title: Anyone starting the new Python course?
posts.author: Emily Chen
posts.content: I just started the Python fundamentals course. Is anyone else on the same course? Would be cool to form a study group and share progress together!

posts.title: Need help with Database Design project
posts.author: Alex Rodriguez
posts.content: I'm stuck on the database normalization part of my project. Any experts here who can help me understand the concept better? Much appreciated!

comments.author: David Kim
comments.content: Normalization is about removing redundancy. Start with 1NF, then 2NF, then 3NF.
